task.title: Uploading media
task.shortdesc: Kaltura capture allows the user to upload previously recorded media. Using the upload feature is recommended for sharing previously recorded media to Canvas.

step.cmd: Select the + Add Newbutton in the upper-right corner of the page
Select Upload New Media to make the upload media window appear
Drag and drop your file into the display box or select + Choose a File Upload to button to browse files on your computer
Update the Name, Description, Tags, and Publishing Schedule as desired
Select Saveat the bottom of the page

info.note: Your file may take some time to process depending on the size and quality chosen, but it is available in My Media once fully uploaded.
